description: PK-DB an open database for pharmacokinetics information from clinical trials as well as pre-clinical research. The focus of PK-DB is to provide high-quality pharmacokinetics data enriched with the required meta-information for computational modeling and data integration.
name: PK-DB

institution.description: Humboldt University of Berlin is a university in the central borough of Mitte in Berlin, Germany. It was established by Frederick William III on the initiative of Wilhelm von Humboldt, Johann Gottlieb Fichte and Friedrich Ernst Daniel Schleiermacher as the University of Berlin (Universit√§t zu Berlin) in 1809, and opened in 1810.
